summary.span: 提供 对象的强类型集合。

span.span: Provides a strongly typed collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示一个集合，其中包含计数器的所有实例数据。The class represents a collection containing all the instance data for a counter. 使用方法时，此集合包含在中 。This collection is contained in the when using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了本地计算机上特定的实例数据 。The following code example displays the instance data for a particular on the local computer. 它首先显示名称的编号列表 。It first displays a numbered list of names. 用户输入其中一个类别的编号后，此示例将获取的 。After the user enters the number of one of the categories, the example gets the for that . 然后，它将返回的集合转换 为对象的数组 。It then converts the collection returned by to an array of objects. 该示例还显示与 每个关联的实例数据 。The example also displays the instance data associated with each of each . span.span: Determines whether a performance instance with a specified name (identified by one of the indexed objects) exists in the collection.

returns.span: 如果集合中存在该实例，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the instance exists in the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `instanceName`参数不区分大小写。The `instanceName` parameter is case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 从命令行接受类别名称、计数器名称和实例名称。The following code example accepts a category name, counter name, and instance name from the command line. 它获取 类别的，它是对象的集合 。It gets the for the category, which is a collection of objects. 从中获取指定计数器的特定 。From that it gets the particular for the specified counter. 然后，它使用 方法来确定指定的实例是否存在，并使用默认的单实例名称（如果未输入）。It then uses the method to determine if the specified instance exists, using the default single-instance name if none is entered. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法将转换为 对象数组。The following code example uses the method to convert an into an array of objects. 数组中每个元素的和属性的值将 传递给函数以便进一步处理。The values of the and properties of each element of the array are passed to a function for further processing. remarks.format: ## Remarks `instanceName`参数不区分大小写。The `instanceName` parameter is case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 从命令行接受类别名称、计数器名称和实例名称。The following code example accepts a category name, counter name, and instance name from the command line. 它获取 类别的，它是对象的集合 。It gets the for the category, which is a collection of objects. 从中获取指定计数器的特定 。From that it gets the particular for the specified counter. 然后，如果实例存在，则该示例使用 (引用为索引器) 的属性来获取关联的 对象。Then, if the instance exists, the example uses the property (referenced as an indexer) to obtain the associated object. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Keys { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对象和与该实例数据关联的对象的计数器注册表项。

span.span: Gets the object and counter registry keys for the objects associated with this instance data.

value.span: 表示一组对象特定的注册表项的 。

span.span: An that represents a set of object-specific registry keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个软件组件在安装时创建其对象和计数器的密钥，并在执行时写入计数器数据。Each software component creates keys for its objects and counters when it is installed and writes counter data while it is executing. 你可以像访问任何其他注册表数据一样访问此数据。You can access this data as you would access any other registry data. 但是，尽管你使用注册表来收集性能数据，但数据并不存储在注册表数据库中。However, although you use the registry to collect performance data, the data is not stored in the registry database. 相反，系统从适当的系统对象管理器收集数据。Instead, the system collects the data from the appropriate system object managers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用的 属性 返回实例名称的集合，该集合将转换为的数组 。The following code example uses the property of an to return a collection of instance names, which it converts to an array of . 它 使用属性生成对象的数组 。It generates an array of objects using the property. 对于实例名称数组中的每个元素，它将显示名称并调用函数来处理关联的 对象。For each element in the array of instance names, it displays the name and calls a function to process the associated object. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/CS/instdatakeysvalues.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/VB/instdatakeysvalues.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Values { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取组成计数器实例数据的原始计数器值。

span.span: Gets the raw counter values that comprise the instance data for the counter.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示计数器的原始数据值。

span.span: An that represents the counter's raw data values.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用的 属性 来返回对象的集合 ，并将其转换为数组。The following code example uses the property of an to return a collection of objects, which it converts to an array. 它使用属性生成实例名的数组 。It generates an array of instance names using the property. 对于对象数组中的每个元素 ，它显示关联的实例名称，并调用函数来处理 对象。For each element in the array of objects, it displays the associated instance name and calls a function to process the object. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/CS/instdatakeysvalues.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/VB/instdatakeysvalues.vb#3)]
